name: Cold:Non-Linear
description:
In Cold:Non-Linear, you play as a young black bear, named Jordan, who has recently graduated high school. With his friends slowly drifting apart , Jordan will need to answer an  important question: what will he do with his life? Whether he pursues his passions, or otherwise, the choice is yours.

Cold: Non-Linear  is a mature themed visual novel, featuring four male romance options and a diverging narrative in which EVERY choice matters. New updates are released on the 7th of each month; if you'd like to gain  early access to future releases, as well as support my other projects, visit Grizzy Studio's Patreon for more information.

You can find my stories, art, and other endeavors on Twitter, Tumblr, and Furaffinity.

An ongoing, realistic fantasy, story, following an Ursine runt on a quest to overcome his tragic past.


Follow my journey to artistic mastery..

Thank you and enjoy! If there are any problems downloading, please let me know!
